file_content.text: I'll be leaving Balmorra soon. New assignment... another Sith Lord to track.
I found Lord Dakron at the spaceport. We fought.
And you were the victor.
You can't appreciate what you've done without seeing the atrocities he committed. But I can.
No one else dies because Lord Dakron doesn't believe that methane-breathers feel pain, or because his research is worth more than alien life. Thank you.
This is Agent Protarius. Accessing now... blast it, our target is on the move. Lord Dakron is heading for the spaceport--you need to intercept him!
You need to access the Imperial database at the Sobrik headquarters. Otherwise, we'll never find Lord Dakron.
I know you. You're the Jedi who got the Nar Shaddaa outpost wiped out. Small galaxy.
Well, if it isn't the great Jedi diplomat.
Well, if it isn't one of Garza's gun-luggers.
You're one of the new privateers, huh?
More fodder for the front lines, huh?
Tell me: the words "Krikthasi Massacre" mean anything to you?
It doesn't sound familiar.
You sound like you know me.
Who wants to know?
Protarius. Strategic Information Service. Let me tell you a story.
It was a massacre that took place somewhere called Krikthasi?
I can take a guess....
Close. The Krikthasi were the victims.
Sith Lord called Dakron was visiting the Krikthasi homeworld two years back. Krikthasi are a private, ugly people--look like ribbon jelly.
Lord Dakron wants to know Krikthasi history. They don't want to share, so he boils their capital. Krikthasi Massacre. Not the worst Dakron has done, either.
You're telling me because this Sith Lord is on Balmorra.
Let me guess: Dakron is here.
"Not the worst he's done"?
Lots of "anti-alien" activity--enslavement, resettlement, genocide.
Bad things happen.
Sure--but we can at least avenge the dead.
I've been tracking Lord Dakron for the SIS. Balmorra's just a stopover for him--he landed two days ago, he's leaving tomorrow.
He's escaped us seven times. You're our chance to break into the Imperial base, locate the Sith and take him out. Justice served.
He won't escape again.
I can try to arrest him.
I can try to arrest him.
If you think he'll talk, you're fooling yourself--but I'll take what I can get.
First step is to find the Imperial database in Sobrik. Give me a call and I'll slice in, pinpoint Lord Dakron's location. Then we really get started.
Not a chance. [Refuse quest]
Well, I'm sure it'll be months before he tries to kill another species. You take care.
Nice place, Balmorra. Glad I'm not assigned here.
The great Jedi diplomat. Fancy meeting you out here.
I know you. You're one of Garza's gun-luggers.
A moment. There's an Imperial garrison within spitting distance, so I'll be brief.
He's escaped us seven times. You're our chance to break into that Imperial base, locate the Sith and take him out. Justice served.
The words "Krikthasi Massacre" mean anything to you?"
